titles.title: To ban the importation of large capacity ammunition feeding devices, and to extend the ban on transferring such devices to those that were manufactured before the ban became law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 3/31/1998--Introduced. Amends Federal criminal law to make it unlawful for any person to import a large capacity ammunition feeding device. Extends the ban on the transfer of such devices to those manufactured before enactment of the ban.
